name: Reverse Fantasy Legend 逆袭幻想传
description: Hahaha! The harem king must be me! Light novel + independent game! Unique light novel content, unique independent game experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1200 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720
